text:
Location:
 At your page "Apache Tutorial: Dynamic Content with CGI/For more information" [1]
Error: 
 The hyperlink to the Usenet group comp.infosystems.www.authoring.cgi [2] is broken.
Evidence: 
 See the post "comp.infosystems.www.authoring.cgi will be removed" [3].
References:
 [1] http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/howto/cgi.html#moreinfo
 [2] news:comp.infosystems.www.authoring.cgi
 [3] news:hmi5ve$klr$1@news.albasani.net
Recommended actions:
 * Re-register the newsgroup under the auspices of Apache Project, or
 * failing that, remove the hyperlink.
creator: ne01026@shark.2a.pl
rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.
thanks for the report,  killed broken links to the NG and to hoohoo
creator: covener@gmail.com
